trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_SEQ_00<tab>The Crystal Exarch is finally ready to discuss the matter of your comrades' whereabouts.
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Crystarium gatekeep.
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the Crystal Exarch.
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the Crystal Exarch.
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the Crystal Exarch.
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the manager of suites in the Pendants.
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_TODO_05<tab>Speak with the Crystal Exarch in the Ocular.
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_GARLONDMAN03279_100_000<tab>I've been keeping that device you uncovered safe and sound. Did you need to use it again...?
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_Q0_100_000<tab>Touch the beacon and travel to the First?

TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_MYSTERYVOICE_000_000<tab>You've done as I requested, and learned something of the world in which you find yourself. Now it's time I fulfilled my half of the bargain, and explained what has befallen your comrades.

TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_MYSTERYVOICE_000_001<tab>That is a conversation I would rather have in the privacy of my quarters, however. I must go on ahead to the tower and organize a few things, but I shall see that the guard knows to admit you.
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_Q1_000_002<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_A1_000_003<tab>The tower's gate lies open, then?
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_A1_000_004<tab>Just like that? Then...G'raha Tia is...?
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_MYSTERYVOICE_000_005<tab>Well, yes, of course. It can be opened and closed just like any other. Does that seem strange to you?
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_MYSTERYVOICE_000_006<tab>I know not how the tower functioned in your time, but I assure you there is no danger of us being locked inside.
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_MYSTERYVOICE_000_007<tab>...I am not familiar with that name. Is there something I should know?

TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_MYSTERYVOICE_000_008<tab>An extraordinary tale. But I'm afraid I found no such individual residing in the tower when it passed into my care. Mayhap we can revisit that mystery another time. For now, I think it best that we focus on the present.
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_CRYSTALGATEKEEPER_000_010<tab>Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. The Exarch awaits you within.
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_Q2_000_011<tab>Enter the Crystal Tower?
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_CRYSTALGATEKEEPER_000_020<tab>Touring the city with the Exarch, are you? You could have no finer guide!
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_MYSTERYVOICE_000_030<tab>The Crystarium boasts a number of residential districts, but I have been informed that a room has just become available at the Pendants.

TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_MYSTERYVOICE_000_031<tab>Which, as it turns out, is perfect. Our path there will take us past the markets, and I was hoping to give you my own introduction to their wares. Come along.
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_SYSTEM_000_035<tab>As a result of your pact with Feo Ul, you now have access to delivery moogles, market boards, and summoning bells while in the First.
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS_000_040<tab>Welcome to the Pendants, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. You're here with the Exarch...?

TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_MYSTERYVOICE_000_050<tab>Ah, there you are─I was just finalizing the matter of your accommodation. You'll have a private room here at the Pendants for the duration of your stay, to make use of as you see fit.
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_MYSTERYVOICE_000_051<tab>When you are ready to retire, the manager will show you to your lodgings. Pray rest and recuperate, and we shall reconvene in the Ocular anon.
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_MYSTERYVOICE_000_052<tab>I believe that covers all of the practical concerns...

TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_MYSTERYVOICE_000_053<tab>...Thank you for answering my call, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We are denied the comforting blanket of night, but may peaceful dreams attend you nonetheless.
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS_000_060<tab>A pleasure to meet you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, and welcome to your new home at the Pendants.
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS_000_061<tab>Your room is ready, if you'd care to retire?
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_Q3_000_062<tab>Retire to your quarters?
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_CRYSTALGATEKEEPER_000_070<tab><var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The Exarch awaits you within.
TEXT_LUCKMA103_03281_Q4_000_071<tab>Enter the Ocular?
